channel.title: .:How do I create shops?:
channel.description: How do I make a shop on my server?

item.title: .:How do I create shops?:
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

To place your NPC in the desired area use autospawn.cfg, there should be a few examples there which you could easily follow, and shops.cfg to edit what is inside of your shop.
If you use the search bar i’m sure you can find more information on the topic and a better explained tutorial.

[quote=“newb pk3r, post:2, topic:285421”]What kind of server do you have,

relate on the thread “be specific”,.[/quote]
and i’m sure what “newb” meant, though I may be wrong, was whether your server is a 317, 508 etc.

-----------------------EDIT-------------------------

[quote=“Kalvin, post:4, topic:285421”]If its delta then autospawn.cfg to move thee shop.

Nd shop.cfg to add wats in the shop[/quote]
Sorry kalvin, I hadn;t realised you had answered.

Read full topic
